title: LeBron James is distracted, Antonio Brown rejects the Bills and Colin's NBA Playoff predictions!
itunes:title: LeBron James is distracted, Antonio Brown rejects the Bills and Colin's NBA Playoff predictions!
description:
Colin discusses what the main problem Los Angeles Lakers F LeBron James faced this season, teams that have backed away from Pittsburgh Steelers WR Antonio Brown, the best scorers in NBA history, and his NBA playoff predictions. Guests include Albert Breer, Stephen Jackson, Chris Haynes, and Jason McIntyre. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
